summary: REQ-1 and REQ-2 appear implemented via safe-area-aware padding adjustments and an added horizontal shift variable in BottomTabs along with CSS variables. Several unrelated files were modified (urlParams utility, generated summaries, project_state), which were not requested for this UI-only fix.

hallucinated_features.description: Changes to URL parameter/sessionStorage utilities unrelated to bottom navigation layout/clipping/shift.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asks to fix bottom navigation clipping and shift tabs left; no URL parameter utility changes were requested.
Not part of requested functional/UI change; BuildRequest does not request updating a file summary artifact.

hallucinated_features.description: Project state tracking file updated (feature request status metadata).
